title: Good but small
text: The museum is good and well designed. It only displays Acropolis related exhibits. A visit of one hour is probably enough for most.

title: Good icecream
text: We had one of the ice cream cakes, which was good. They have almost solely ice creams, don’t expect other things.

title: The main attraction
text: The main attraction in Athens. A short climb but full of tourists. A must see. Allow at least one hour, two is preferable.

title: Gourmet!
text: Amazing food, the steak and moussaka were delicious. The service was efficient polite and welcoming. Wine selection was a bit small.

title: Best Italian I had in a while
text: Great place. Pasta and pizza were amazing, and the tiramisu as well. The service was great. Great if you are looking for Italian food in Athens.

title: Simply excellent
text: We had a pasta with minced veal and a sea bass. Both were exquisite. The sitting is nice and comfortable and the prices reasonable.

title: Bad pizza
text: We came for a quick lunch and had a salad and a pizza. The pizza was bad and the salad ok. The baklava dessert was also ok and the service was kind but slow.

title: A nice smoothie break
text: Wide variety of great smoothies. The place looks newly renovated and is cozy and nice to sit in. A great break

title: Superb
text: Great atmosphere and really good food. We had the fish of the day, lamb shank and orange soufflé which was unique. Service was great

title: Huge wine variety
text: The wine menu is huge with all Greek wine options. The wine we had was great. On the other hand the food options are very limited.

title: A break with a view
text: We went for dessert and coffee. Everything was great. The view to the city is beautiful. The only downside is the smoking

title: Good food cramped sitting
text: Good Greek salad, great souvlaki, ok lambs chops and amazing lemon tart. The service was great and efficient. The sitting was too cramped

title: Great place
text: We had the lamb, a salad and pavlova desert. All was great and the service very good. The menu is very diverse and the alcohol menu is quite large

title: Great experience
text:
Beautiful restaurant with excellent food and great service. The menu is rich and diverse and the portions big and tasty.
We had the lamb ribs and a salad.

title: Great desserts but tasteless food
text: We went there twice. The desserts were great, but the food wasn't. The service was good at one time but very bad at the other- I had to ask for the bill three times. The place inside is beautiful.

title: AMAZING!
text: Great food and great wine (thanks to the waiter's recommendation). The service was perfect and the restaurant is beautiful. If you like Italian this restaurant is for you.

title: Nice breakfast
text: We had poached eggs coffee and freshly squeezed orange juice. Everything was delicious and the service was good.

title: Best macaroons we ever had
text:
Wow!
Amazing macaroons - we had nine of them they were so good. The pistachio are recommended the most.
place: Chez Dodo Artisan Macarons and Café

title: Nice concept
text:
The beers were nice and the food ok.
Good service and nice setting.
Recommended for beer tasting mostly

title: Really bad coffee
text:
Sat there for coffee and cake but the options for desserts were very limited. The coffee was very bad.
The view is beautiful.

title: Great except the burgers
text: Everything was great - the service, the nachos, the beer and the chips except the burgers which were mediocre.

title: Great atmosphere
text:
A very good place for wine and cheeses. They also have a large menu.
A lot of pork cold cuts, but a very good place even if you don't like cold cuts.

title: Amazing and authentic!
text: Great Italian restaurant - pizza just like in italy. Great service and delicious dessert. If you like Italian food this is the place for you!

title: High quality but small portions
text:
The food and wine were delicious except the mousse dessert which was only ok.
The service was good and the atmosphere great - the place is very nice. The portions were small and pricey, and the menu very short. If, like us, you have restrictions in your food selection than you won't have much to choose from.

title: Good wine and dessert, slow service
text: We came for glass of wine and dessert. We were ignored for a long time but the service improved after we ordered. The wine and dessert were very good.

title: Amazing cheese burger
text: I had the cheese burger with mushrooms. It comes in a cheese bun and is absolutely delicious. The service was also great. Highly recommended!

title: Nice place
text:
We had the caeser salad and a beer. The place is nice with a view to the street.
The prices are ok and the service quick and polite.

title: Great strudel
text: We had the apple and the curd strudel. Both were great and cheap (400-500ft). The service was good and the atmosphere nice.

title: Amazing service, CASH ONLY!
text: Good restaurant- nice food and great service. Small and cozy. We had the onion soup, carpaccio for starters and the chicken and pizza for main course. The main courses were ok and the starters were good. All dishes were generous.

title: Great service, amazing tiramisu
text: We had risotto and pizza. The risotto was good, the pizza was ok, a bit plain. The tiramisu was amazing and the wine good and cheap.

title: Great meat and good wine, expensive
text: We had a ribeye (entrecote) steak and the rossini steak. Both were very good and the wine was also great. Everything was a bit expensive. One of the waiters was rude, the others were polite.

title: Good streak, mediocre burger
text: The service and location of the restaurant are great. The burger wasn't so good and a bit overpriced. On the other hand the streak was good and cheap.

title: Good crepes
text:
We had the 4 cheeses - which was great and caramel butter- which was ok.
The service was good and efficient.

title: Good food, a bit too expensive
text:
We came here twice while staying in venice, since it was very hard to find a another good restaurant in the area.
The food and service were good but the prices were too expensive.The cover charge was 3 euros a person.

title: Good simple food
text: We had pasta and pizza, both were good but simple. The prices were fair and the service efficient. There was no cover charge.

title: Good simple food
text: We had great lunch here, they have huge menu in reasonable prices. The dishes were big and generous and the stuff was good.

title: Mediocre expensive food in small portions
text:
We came for dinner and had two types of fish- salmon and bass. Both were simple and dry, and very small. The potatoes were even worse. We actually stayed hungry because we didn't want to order another bad dish.
The wine was disgusting.
The prices are high for such small servings.

Service was good and the restaurant is beautiful.

title: Great baked goods
text: We had 3 pastries with marzipan, which were excellent and two cappuccinos, all for 7.5 euros. Highly recommended.

title: Wine tasting with a view
text: Great experience, tasting a wide range of local white wine with a great view to the scenery surrounding san gimignano.

title: Great pizza, bad dessert
text: We had two pizzas (buffalo and four cheeses) and both were great. The service was also very good and in english. The only bad part was the dessert, a cheese cake with the taste of a block of butter.

title: Mediocre burger, expensive and small dishes
text: We had the chianti burger and one of the chef's daily specials- cannaloni. Both were not great and very small. All three menu was quite expensive.

title: Great juice
text:
Had the morning sun and tropicale. Tropicale was great, morning sun good.
All from fresh fruits.
A bit expensive though.

title: Good and cheap
text:
Excellent croissants, good coffee.
Cheap although it is in central location.
Uncomfortable sitting.
Good for a quick breakfast.

title: Exceptional food, Amazing service
text:
Can't exaggerate how good this place is!

We came for dinner at the restaurant at via dei cerchi, we had a streak and a pasta with porcini and truffles. Both were amazing. The wine was great. The dessert (cheese cake) was perfect.
Service was perfect - kind, nice, with a smile, and with good english.
The prices are fair and even cheap relative to the quality of food.
The restaurant is beautiful and with great atmosphere.

title: Nice sandwich, bad wine, not so cheap
text:
We had a sandwich with mozzarella, tomato and basil which was nice. With a glass of rose and a glass of red. The wine was bad.
Service was nice but the price a bit costly for a sandwich and two plastic cups of wine.

title: Great burger, nice beer
text: I had the mushroom sauce and cheese burger. It was great (although the beef was well done). The beer was also nice (belgian).

title: Average pasta, ok service
text: We had pasta and ravioli, both were ok but not more than that. Size of dishes and prices were fair. Wine was average.

title: Popsicle shaped delicious ice cream
text:
a small ice cream shop selling popsicle shaped ice cream in many tastes, with a choice of 4 covers and 3 types of nuts to top it.
We took the cafe and milk tastes. The cafe was great.

title: Great ice cream but expensive
text: We had the chocolate almonds and dulce de leche. All three were amazing. The vanilla macaroon was also great. Prices were a bit too high.

title: Amazing streak, perfect service!
text:
The steaks here were amazing - done to perfection, with great toppings.
The service was perfect, the house wine very good.
Romantic atmosphere and a beautiful restaurant.

Highly recommended!
Perfect experience.

title: Good pizza
text:
We ate here for lunch. The menu was self explainatory and we took the 4 cheeses pizza and the traditional naples margarita.
Both were very good but a bit expensive. Service was good.

title: Ok tiramisu, no place to sit
text:
The place has a lot cakes but we only tried the tiramisu
We took the pistachio tiramisu. It is bought in a paper box. It was ok but not very good. We ate much better tiramisu in cafes and restaurants around Rome.

title: Great tiramisu
text:
Great tiramisu in two sizes, perfect cream.
We had the pistachio, peanut butter and caramel. All were good, pistachio was the best. Small place, not much space to sit.

title: Very bad
text: Worst food I ate in italy. Ate the meatballs, ravioli and pate. Uncomfortable seating. Dirty toilets.ok waiters.the only thing good here is the wine.

title: Rude service
text: Rude service and they didn't speak English. Ok cake (pistachio). Bad ice coffee and ice lemonade.expensive.

title: Great restaurant, best service.
text:
Great restaurant, ate the artichoke ravioli and the gnocchi. Both were great. The staff were amazingly polite and efficient. The restaurant beautiful - sit inside!
We also ate the tiramisu which was superb.

title: Nice pizza and good service
text: Ate two kinds of pizzas, regular not the gluten free. Both were great. Nice wine and tiramisu. Seat was ok, service good.

title: Good ice cream, no sitting place.
text: The ice cream was good, had the pistachio, caramel and cafe. Pistachio was the best. There was nowhere to sit.

title: Good pizza and service.
text: We had the margarita and mushrooms pizzas. They were very good and the service was kind and helpful. The sitting was uncomfortable. The price fair.

title: Great food, beautiful restaurant.
text: We had pasta, both of them were great, the sauce amazing. The restaurant is beautiful and the service was great - polite efficient and kind. Also had amazing cheap wine ( recommended by the waiter) and great tiramisu.
place: La Ciambella Bar à Vin con Cucina
